projects.title: SoundScholars
projects.affiliation: AI in Education | University of Michigan
projects.description: A cognitive tutor that teaches novices musical rhythms in a fun and approachable way via learning pages and targeted exercises.

projects.title: SignSavvy
projects.affiliation: Software for Accessibility | University of Michigan
projects.description: Aimed at breaking down communication barriers for American Sign Language (ASL) users, SignSavvy is a web application that provides users with real-time translation of the ASL alphabet.

projects.title: LLM Inference Scheduling
projects.affiliation: Systems for Generative AI | University of Michigan
projects.description: Introduce a novel scheduling algorithm for LLMs that combines Round-Robin (RR) and Shortest Job First (SJF) approaches.

projects.title: Ask485?
projects.description: A fully functional search engine created via a segmented inverted index of webpages, an index server (search results), and a search server (UI).

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Learn Astro and brush up on CSS while showcasing some of my favorite course projects.
